description: Everybody's favourite comfort food has had a fresh update. The kids will love this version of mac 'n' cheese – even if it is green.
name: Kid’s Green Mac ’n’ Cheese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 sprigs continental parsley, leaves picked, roughlychopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until softened. Add broccoli and milk, then bring to a simmer. Simmer, covered, for 12 minutes or until milk has reduced by half.
Add spinach and cook for 1 minute, stirring, or until wilted. Using a stick blender, blend milk mixture until smooth and combined. Add pasta, cheese and mustard powder, then stir to combine.
Meanwhile, preheat flasks, if using, by filling with boiling water and standing for 5 minutes. Drain. Spoon pasta into flasks. Sprinkle with parsley. Serve.
